graphql-desc: GraphQL proxy for the action API
graphql-sandbox-jsonly: JavaScript is required to use the GraphQL sandbox.
graphql-schema-error-no-composite-fields: $1 may only use interface or scalar fields. Field $2 uses $3 instead.
graphql-schema-error-missing-field-inter: $2 is not a part of any interfaces implemented on $1
graphql-schema-error-modified-interface: $1 has been modified or is missing from the schema.
